section.title: Remember User Account
section.para: Users who return to &PRODUCT; regularly can be automatically authenticated to avoid performing an explicit authentication each time they access the portal.

step.para: Input your registered user name and password.
Select the Remember My Login check box when logging in &PRODUCT; at the first time.
Click the Sign in button to sign in the portal.

section.para: Do not sign out when you leave the portal and you will be automatically authenticated next time you visit it.
